#summary A light weight JSSP container.
#labels Featured,java,server,jssp

= Introduction =

A light weight JSSP container.

= Details =

Get JsspServer:
{{{
svn co http://hatter-source-code.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/resourceproxy/ resourceproxy
cd resourceproxy
ant jsspserver
}}}

Then you will get `jsspserver-N.N.jar`.

Now you can programming with jsspserver.

Sample: 
{{{
svn co http://hatter-source-code.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/hostsmanager/ hostsmanager
}}}
